sub_title: Territory Manager | International Content Services | EMEA
summary: I'm a motivated professional with a passion for languages, films (classic dramas!), and project management. Holding an MA degree in Translating Popular Culture, I'm currently overseeing the Into English subtitling services division at Pixelogic Media. Having worked as a subtitler myself for four years translating from English into my native language German, I have come to learn what good quality subtitles are and developed high standards to monitor that quality. As Territory Manager, I am able to work independently, find, define, and streamline (new) workflows to deliver projects on time as well as build and maintain strong relationships with colleagues and clients while always trying to answer to their needs within the best of my capabilities.
